title: Jenna Dewan hides her baby bump in a floral dress and celebrates launch of her book Gracefully You
text:
She announced her second pregnancy just a few weeks ago with a heartwarming post on Instagram.

And Jenna Dewan isn't slowing down anytime soon as she launched her new book Gracefully You in New York City on Tuesday morning.

The 38-year-old actress donned a gorgeous floral dress for an appearance at Good Morning America where she revealed she 'learned a lot' about herself through the process of writing.

Author: Jenna Dewan isn't slowing down anytime soon as she launched her new book Gracefully You in New York City on Tuesday morning

Jenna's gorgeous gown featured pale peach flowers across sheer material, with a delicate pink polka dot lace along the neckline and hem.

She added inches to her petite frame with a pair of nude heels and opted to go accessory-free for the first official promo stop.

Her dark brown hair was parted down the middle and worn in loose curls, with a pale pink shade swiped across her lips.

Beautiful: The actress donned a gorgeous floral dress for an appearance at Good Morning America where she revealed she 'learned a lot' about herself through the process of writing

Lovely: Jenna's gorgeous gown featured pale peach flowers across sheer material, with a delicate pink polka dot lace along the neckline and hem

She chatted with GMA host Michael Strahan about the release of her book, which was initially more focused on poetry.

'It was kind of something completely different and then I went through some crazy years and learned a lot about myself,' she said.

Jenna split from her husband of nine years, Channing Tatum, in April and she filed for divorce six months later.

Great heights: She added inches to her petite frame with a pair of nude heels and opted to go accessory-free for the first official promo stop

Reasonable brag: Jenna shared on Instagram that she's 'a tad bit excited' as she twirled her dress in the middle of the city

Strahan asked how difficult it was for Dewan to find some kind of balance in the turmoil of the separation.

'For me, I really decided in that moment to ... learn about myself and find the graceful way to do it as much as possible,' she said. I learned a lot and I came out stronger.'

She went on to say: 'I'm happier ... so joyful. So to me this is just a little bit of paying it forward and expressing my experience.'

Jenna began dating Steve Kazee nearly one year ago and the couple are expecting their first child together.
description: The 38-year-old actress donned a gorgeous floral dress for an appearance at Good Morning America where she revealed she 'learned a lot' about herself through the process of writing.
